mapper.select: SELECT udd.*,u.`uname`,sh.`shname`,sh.`shaddr` FROM `userdingdan` udd INNER JOIN `user` u ON u.`uid` = udd.`uid` INNER JOIN `shanghu` sh ON sh.`shid` = udd.`shid` WHERE udd.`uzhuangtai` = 'f003'
SELECT usp.*,sp.`sname`,sp.`sprice` FROM `usershop` usp INNER JOIN `shop` sp ON usp.`sid` = sp.`sid` WHERE usp.`uddid` = #{uddid}

SELECT udd.*,u.uname,usp.sid AS spsid FROM `cheliangxianxi` cxx INNER JOIN `userdingdan` udd ON cxx.uddid = udd.uddid INNER JOIN USER u ON u.uid = udd.uid INNER JOIN `usershop` usp ON usp.uddid = udd.uddid WHERE cxx.pcid = #{pcid}
